verbs.description: Democrats [V: are] seizing on the Trump administration ’s push in court to overturn ObamaCare ’s protections for people with pre - existing conditions , hoping to leverage the issue ahead of November ’s midterm elections as some Republicans rush to distance themselves from the move .
